code

Class UberAppSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • code.UberAppSimulator

  • public class UberAppSimulator
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UberAppSimulator()
      UberAppSimulator constructor that sets all of the values for drivers, passengers, successful/cancelled rides, and the JSON object for all the trips

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void logFinalState()
      Writes the log file for the final state of the simulation, logs the driver and passenger info at the time of the simulation finish and specifies the users with successful or cancelled rides
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main function that simulates a ride for every passenger in the map, then logs those rides in JSON objects
      static void readFileInfo()
      Helper function that reads information from a specified text file and parses it to create an array of Driver objects and an array of Passenger objects with the correct information, as well as setting the current rate for rides.
      static boolean validateDropOff(java.awt.Point dropOff)
      Validates the current drop off point to make sure it is in the grid, if not it cancels that ride
      static void writeJSONFile()
      Writes the JSON object with all of the trip information to a json file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • UberAppSimulator

        public UberAppSimulator()
        UberAppSimulator constructor that sets all of the values for drivers, passengers, successful/cancelled rides, and the JSON object for all the trips

    • Method Detail

      • readFileInfo

        public static void readFileInfo()
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Helper function that reads information from a specified text file and parses it to create an array of Driver objects and an array of Passenger objects with the correct information, as well as setting the current rate for rides.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • validateDropOff

        public static boolean validateDropOff(java.awt.Point dropOff)
        Validates the current drop off point to make sure it is in the grid, if not it cancels that ride
        Parameters:
        dropOff - Point that represents the current dropoff location to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean that returns true if the specified drop off is in the grid and false if it is outside of the grid

      • writeJSONFile

        public static void writeJSONFile()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the JSON object with all of the trip information to a json file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • logFinalState

        public static void logFinalState()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the log file for the final state of the simulation, logs the driver and passenger info at the time of the simulation finish and specifies the users with successful or cancelled rides
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Main function that simulates a ride for every passenger in the map, then logs those rides in JSON objects
        Parameters:
        args - String [] that specifies the arguments of the program
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
